name: Tork
description:
-Tork-

~Dodge, roll and shoot up the waves of incoming bomb-balls!~

~Destroy all enemies to advance to the next wave.  ~

~Watch out, two consecutive hits will destroy you! ~

~Jump in the air while shooting for slowmo!~

~Controls~ (Xbox/Mouse & Keyboard)

WASD/LeftJoystick- Move

LMB/RightJoystick- Aim

RMB/RTrigger- Shoot

Shift/LTrigger- Sprint

Space/A- Jump

Ctrl/LBumper- Brake

R/X- Reload

N- Restart
